content.content:

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1893.

content.title: Summer (southern hemisphere)
content.content:
J.R.R. Tolkien spends the cool hours in the family garden usually watching his father plant vines or trees.
Ronald is bitten by a tarantula and runs away in terror, his nurse grabs him and sucks the poison out.
He shows interest in drawing, usually scribbling with pencil and paper.
He is bothered by teething and his health suffers in the heat.

content.title: April
content.content:
8 - Vincent Trought, a member of the T.C.B.S., is born.
20 - Christopher Wiseman, the only of Tolkien's friends that survived World War I, is born.

content.title: October
content.content:
25 - Robert Gilson, childhood friend of Tolkien, is born.
Years
1890 1891 1892 1893 1894 1895 1896
